meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #4477.

td.p: Muhammad Meigooni, a senior from Springfield, Illinois
Brad Hoff, a senior from Pembroke, Massachusetts
Courtney Bennis, a senior from Virginia Beach, Virginia

tr.td: SCULPTURE
ANIMATED STARS
THE BODY HUMAN
TEEN CUISINE
NAME THE AUTOMAKER
BEASTLY EXPRESSIONS

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'Both Michelangelo, in 1504, & Donatello, around 1408, sculpted marble statues of this Biblical king')

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_J_3_4', 'clue_J_3_4_stuck', '(Muhammad: Let\'s make it a non-fictitious Daily Double. [laughter] True.)
(Alex: A true Daily Double. OK, playing games with the host; the aging host of Jeopardy!)
...
(Muhammad: I think I\'m having total problems working on my game, not getting any options here. [laughter] Um, can I phone a friend?)
(Alex: No, wrong show.)
[laughter]
(Muhammad: Oh, man. What am I, voted off the island or something now?)
[laughter]
(Alex: No. [laughter] Hurry up.)

hinge joint

Muhammad
')
